ucmd lspSourceCursor main_template main.cpp 0
setenv offset stdout

ucmd lspCallHierarchy main.cpp offset
contains stdout "main.cpp:8:11"
contains stdout "main.cpp:9:11"

-- main_template --
int maâ—in2(){
	return 2;
}
int main3(){
	return 3;
}
int main() {
	int v1 = main2()
	int v2 = main2+main3();
	return 0;
}
